```{r libraries}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r functions}
scale_and_round <- function(x, factor) {
    round(x / (100 / factor))
}
```

```{r loading data, echo=FALSE}
data <- read_excel("H:/Interne.Francesco/Classeur1.xlsx", sheet = "Feuil2")

```

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  rename(question = "...1")

data = data %>%
    mutate(across(-question, ~ ifelse(grepl("%", .), parse_number(gsub("%", "", .)), as.numeric(.)))) %>%
    mutate(across(-question, ~ ifelse(. > 100, ./10, .))) %>%
    mutate(across(-question, ~ ifelse(. <= 1, .*100, .))) %>%
    print(n = 52)

data_bk = data
```

```{r}
data = data %>%
    mutate(
        across(
            starts_with("tout"),
            ~ scale_and_round(., 51)
        ),
        across(
            starts_with("ide"),
            ~ scale_and_round(., 22)
        ),
        across(
            starts_with("mg"),
            ~ scale_and_round(., 12)
        ),
        across(
            starts_with("orto"),
            ~ scale_and_round(., 8)
        ),
        across(
            starts_with("pharma"),
            ~ scale_and_round(., 7)
        ),
        across(
            starts_with("sf"),
            ~ scale_and_round(., 2)
        )
    )

n_rebuilt = data

to_check = data %>%
    group_by(question, tout_pre, tout_post) %>%
    summarize(
        pre = sum(across(contains("pre"))),
        post = sum(across(contains("post")))
    ) %>% filter(tout_pre!=pre|tout_post!=post)
```
